video.title: Mysteries at the Museum Collection
video.synopsis: History buff Don Wildman explores archives and museums across the country to uncover objects and artifacts that reveal the nation's hidden secrets.

episodes.synopsis: Documents unlocking the medical mystery of famous Siamese twins, an item from a Cold War plot and a jail cell holding a gangster's secret are shown.
episodes.title: Siamese Twins and More

episodes.synopsis: A clue to the secrets of a drug syndicate and its fall, a gold ingot claimed from sunken treasure and a relic from a crash near Area 51 are examined.
episodes.title: French Connection, Area 51

episodes.synopsis: A tissue sample that sent a doctor to the gallows, birds killed by a baffling epidemic and a kettle settlers used to cook a ghastly stew are shown.
episodes.title: Shoe Bomber and More

episodes.synopsis: A photographic negative of a controversial machine, a limousine used in an assassination plot and a giant book of mysterious birds are featured.
episodes.title: Reagan Limousine

episodes.synopsis: A lantern that guided a teenage girl on a lifesaving quest, a barrel used in a stunt and a fragment from a near-catastrophic disaster are examined.
episodes.title: Heroine, Daredevil & More

episodes.synopsis: Possible proof of a historic journey through Death Valley, bricks from a Civil War prison break and a human scalp with an astounding story are shown.
episodes.title: Prophet of Oak Ridge & More

episodes.synopsis: A revolutionary plow that sows seeds of disaster, a primitive plane that challenges the accepted history of flight and a lethal coin are featured.
episodes.title: Leopold and Loeb, U2 Spy Plane

episodes.synopsis: A harness used in a dangerous mine rescue, a surfboard with evidence of a deadly oceanic predator and a bomb involved in a bank heist are inspected.
episodes.title: Sheppton Mine Disaster

episodes.synopsis: A movie star's dress that some say is cursed, a lump of gray clay that is a prelude to a classic toy and a document from a murder case are examined.
episodes.title: The Conqueror's Curse

episodes.synopsis: A failed invention that helped create a huge industry, the bell of a ship whose crew vanished at sea and a footprint of a swamp creature are featured.
episodes.title: Edison's Electric Pen

episodes.synopsis: A weapon that belonged to a secret spy ring, a journalist's bag and a switchblade that belonged to a man reputed to be a notorious killer are shown.
episodes.title: Operation Pastorius and Nellie Bly

episodes.synopsis: Feather fans used by a risqué dancer to seduce a city, an urn that miraculously endured a disaster and bullet shards from a mobster murder are shown.
episodes.title: Vanishing Lake and More

episodes.synopsis: A mangled car telling of an intrepid journalist's quest for truth, a vial of a liquid "miracle cure" and an iron safe involved in a heist are shown.
episodes.title: The Northfield Raid and More

episodes.synopsis: A box used in a chilling ritual, an oxygen tank that tells a tragic tale and the torn hat of a pastor found at a crime scene are featured.
episodes.title: Margery the Medium, Everest Ascent

episodes.synopsis: Early industrial machinery, a medical jar containing a strange substance and a shirt that is a last vestige of an aviation anomaly are featured.
episodes.title: East River Blowout and More

episodes.synopsis: Ventriloquist dummies, a rudimentary electronic device and a plaster cast footprint that may prove the existence of a mythical creature are featured.
episodes.title: Death of William Wood & More

episodes.synopsis: A pair of timeworn dining implements, a charcoal portrait of a scantily clad man and an aged dossier from the 1950s are featured.
episodes.title: Asylum Poisoning & Naked Joe

episodes.synopsis: A car that promised an automotive revolution, a mystifying musical instrument and a secret message that passed across enemy lines are featured.
episodes.title: Miracle Car, Glass Harmonica

episodes.synopsis: A negative image of an object used in an evil plot, a wax figure of a radical woman and a deadly missile that inspired a household product are shown.
episodes.title: Strangers on a Train

episodes.synopsis: A pistol tied to a bizarre chapter of Wild West history, a Model B Wright Brothers Flyer and an ordinary lawn chair rigged to fly are examined.
episodes.title: Funhouse Mummy, Playboy's Gold

episodes.synopsis: Binders holding clues to the tale of a woman's strange and combustible fate, a box used in a shocking experiment and an oversized pot are featured.
episodes.title: Gold Accumulator Hoax

episodes.synopsis: A pin connected to a devious plot, a bizarre device designed by a Hollywood pioneer and an odd being seen as proof of a close encounter are featured.
episodes.title: Failed Assassination of JFK

episodes.synopsis: An antique cooking pot, a ragged childhood doll and a bizarre collar-like contraption used in a sinister heist are inspected.
episodes.title: Spine Tingling

episodes.synopsis: A U.S. Postal Service mailbox, a set of brass knuckles that protected a president from an evil plot and a hollow coin are showcased.
episodes.title: Secrets of D.C.

episodes.synopsis: A collection of mysterious debris, an antique fire truck and a damaged airplane part whose stories defy explanation are examined.
episodes.title: Unbelievable
